title: The Politics of Catastrophe
itunes:title: The Politics of Catastrophe
description:
Dr. Ryan Keay, Division Chief, at Providence Regional Medical Center Everett discussed discusses efforts to vaccinate more people from Covid-19. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Technology Reporter Mark Gurman talk about the Apple and Epic Saga. Niall Ferguson, Hoover Institution Senior Fellow joins to discuss his new book "Doom: The Politics of Catastrophe.” And we Drive to the Close with George Schultze, Founder of Schultze Asset Management.

Hosted by Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
